title: 分割平衡字符串 (Split a String in Balanced Strings)
content: 思路: // @Title: 分割平衡字符串 (Split a String in Balanced Strings) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-05-13 19:03:04 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int balancedStringSplit(String s) { int count = 0, cha = 0; for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) { if (s.charAt(i) == 'R') { cha++; } else { cha--; } if (cha == 0) { count++; } } return count; } }
